entities.sentence: Gamma-enolase predicts lung damage in severe acute pancreatitis-induced acute lung injury.
Herein, we evaluated the potential of gamma-enolase (ENO2), against its universal isoform alpha-enolase (ENO1), as a marker of SAP-ALI in a rat model.

Here we show that Drosophila Vps8 is highly expressed in hemocytes and nephrocytes, and localizes to early endosomes despite the lack of a clear Vps3 homolog.
We find that Vps8 forms a complex and acts together with Vps16A, Dor/Vps18 and Car/Vps33A, and loss of any of these proteins leads to fragmentation of endosomes.

IKKbeta-NF-kappaB signaling in adult chondrocytes promotes the onset of age-related osteoarthritis in mice.

Canonical nuclear factor kappaB (NF-kappaB) signaling mediated by homo- and heterodimers of the NF-kappaB subunits p65 (RELA) and p50 (NFKB1) is associated with age-related pathologies and with disease progression in posttraumatic models of osteoarthritis (OA).
